Package game.actions.skills

package game.actions.skills
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AreaAttack
    A class that extends action and represents an area of effect attack.
    Flamethrower
    An Action to perform an area attack with a flame weapon.
    Quickstep
    An action representing a unique attack, where the attacker will move directly after attacking within the same turn.
    Slam
    A class that extends AreaAttack and represents an area attack using an actors giant weapon
    SpinningAttack
    A class that extends AreaAttack and represents an area attack using a sword weapon item
    Unsheathe
    An action representing a unique attack where the attacker deals double damage.
